     1‚Üíimport { useState, useCallback, useEffect } from 'react';
     2‚Üíimport { OpenCvProvider, useOpenCv } from 'opencv-react-ts';
     3‚Üíimport { ImageUploader } from './co...

        
        

            
     1‚Üíimport { useState, useCallback, useEffect } from 'react';
     2‚Üíimport { OpenCvProvider, useOpenCv } from 'opencv-react-ts';
     3‚Üíimport { ImageUploader } from './components/ImageUploader';
     4‚Üíimport { ProcessingControls } from './components/ProcessingControls';
     5‚Üíimport { processImage, generatePreviewMask, type ProcessingOptions } from './utils/imageProcessor';
     6‚Üíimport { ResultModal } from './components/ResultModal';
     7‚Üíimport buyMeACoffeeImg from './assets/buy-me-a-coffee-jagadish-kasi.png';
     8‚Üí
     9‚Üífunction AppContent() {
    10‚Üí	const handleReset = useCallback(() => {
    11‚Üí		setOriginalImage(null);
    12‚Üí		setProcessedImage(null);
    13‚Üí		setFileName('');
    14‚Üí		setError(null);
    15‚Üí	}, []);
    16‚Üí	const { loaded, cv } = useOpenCv();
    17‚Üí	const [originalImage, setOriginalImage] = useState<HTMLImageElement | null>(null);
    18‚Üí	const [fileName, setFileName] = useState<string>('');
    19‚Üí	const [processedImage, setProcessedImage] = useState<string | null>(null);
    20‚Üí	const [processing, setProcessing] = useState(false);
    21‚Üí	const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);
    22‚Üí	const [options, setOptions] = useState<ProcessingOptions>({
    23‚Üí		removeCheckered: true,
    24‚Üí		tolerance: 20,
    25‚Üí		selectedColors: [],
    26‚Üí	});
    27‚Üí	const [modalOpen, setModalOpen] = useState(false);
    28‚Üí	const [previewMask, setPreviewMask] = useState<string | null>(null);
    29‚Üí	const [showPreview, setShowPreview] = useState(false);
    30‚Üí	const [cursorMagnifier, setCursorMagnifier] = useState<{
    31‚Üí		x: number;
    32‚Üí		y: number;
    33‚Üí		imgX: number;
    34‚Üí		imgY: number;
    35‚Üí		visible: boolean;
    36‚Üí	} | null>(null);
    37‚Üí
    38‚Üí	const handleImageLoad = useCallback((image: HTMLImageElement, file: File) => {
    39‚Üí		setOriginalImage(image);
    40‚Üí		setFileName(file.name);
    41‚Üí		setProcessedImage(null);
    42‚Üí		setError(null);
    43‚Üí		setPreviewMask(null);
    44‚Üí		setShowPreview(false);
    45‚Üí	}, []);
    46‚Üí
    47‚Üí	const handlePreview = useCallback(() => {
    48‚Üí		if (!originalImage || !loaded || !cv) return;
    49‚Üí
    50‚Üí		// Toggle preview
    51‚Üí		if (showPreview) {
    52‚Üí			setShowPreview(false);
    53‚Üí			setPreviewMask(null);
    54‚Üí			return;
    55‚Üí		}
    56‚Üí
    57‚Üí		setProcessing(true);
    58‚Üí		setError(null);
    59‚Üí		setTimeout(() => {
    60‚Üí			try {
    61‚Üí				const mask = generatePreviewMask(cv, originalImage, options);
    62‚Üí				setPreviewMask(mask);
    63‚Üí				setShowPreview(true);
    64‚Üí			} catch (err) {
    65‚Üí				console.error('Preview error:', err);
    66‚Üí				const details = err instanceof Error && err.message ? ` Details: ${err.message}` : '';
    67‚Üí				setError(`Error generating preview. Please try a different image or adjust settings.${details}`);
    68‚Üí			} finally {
    69‚Üí				setProcessing(false);
    70‚Üí			}
    71‚Üí		}, 100);
    72‚Üí	}, [originalImage, options, loaded, cv, showPreview]);
    73‚Üí
    74‚Üí	const handleProcess = useCallback(() => {
    75‚Üí		if (!originalImage || !loaded || !cv) return;
    76‚Üí
    77‚Üí		setProcessing(true);
    78‚Üí		setError(null);
    79‚Üí		setShowPreview(false);
    80‚Üí		setTimeout(() => {
    81‚Üí			try {
    82‚Üí				const result = processImage(cv, originalImage, options);
    83‚Üí				setProcessedImage(result);
    84‚Üí				setModalOpen(true);
    85‚Üí			} catch (err) {
    86‚Üí				console.error('Processing error:', err);
    87‚Üí				const details = err instanceof Error && err.message ? ` Details: ${err.message}` : '';
    88‚Üí				setError(`Error processing image. Please try a different image or adjust settings.${details}`);
    89‚Üí			} finally {
    90‚Üí				setProcessing(false);
    91‚Üí			}
    92‚Üí		}, 100);
    93‚Üí	}, [originalImage, options, loaded, cv]);
    94‚Üí
    95‚Üí	// For modal download (with optional crop)
    96‚Üí	const handleModalDownload = useCallback(
    97‚Üí		(croppedDataUrl?: string) => {
    98‚Üí			const url = croppedDataUrl || processedImage;
    99‚Üí			if (!url) return;
   100‚Üí			const link = document.createElement('a');
   101‚Üí			const newFileName = fileName.replace(/\.[^.]+$/, '-transparent.png');
   102‚Üí			link.href = url;
   103‚Üí			link.download = newFileName;
   104‚Üí			link.click();
   105‚Üí		},
   106‚Üí		[processedImage, fileName],
   107‚Üí	);
   108‚Üí
   109‚Üí	// Auto-regenerate preview when options change
   110‚Üí	useEffect(() => {
   111‚Üí		if (!showPreview || !originalImage || !loaded || !cv || processing) return;
   112‚Üí
   113‚Üí		const timeoutId = setTimeout(() => {
   114‚Üí			try {
   115‚Üí				const mask = generatePreviewMask(cv, originalImage, options);
   116‚Üí				setPreviewMask(mask);
   117‚Üí			} catch (err) {
   118‚Üí				console.error('Preview regeneration error:', err);
   119‚Üí			}
   120‚Üí		}, 300); // Debounce for 300ms
   121‚Üí
   122‚Üí		return () => clearTimeout(timeoutId);
   123‚Üí	}, [options, showPreview, originalImage, loaded, cv, processing]);
   124‚Üí
   125‚Üí	// Handle color picking from image
   126‚Üí	const handleImageClick = useCallback(
   127‚Üí		(event: React.MouseEvent<HTMLImageElement>) => {
   128‚Üí			if (!originalImage || !cv || !loaded) return;
   129‚Üí
   130‚Üí			const img = event.currentTarget;
   131‚Üí			const rect = img.getBoundingClientRect();
   132‚Üí			const x = Math.floor(((event.clientX - rect.left) / rect.width) * originalImage.naturalWidth);
   133‚Üí			const y = Math.floor(((event.clientY - rect.top) / rect.height) * originalImage.naturalHeight);
   134‚Üí
   135‚Üí			try {
   136‚Üí				const src = cv.imread(originalImage);
   137‚Üí				if (x >= 0 && x < src.cols && y >= 0 && y < src.rows) {
   138‚Üí					const pixel = src.ucharPtr(y, x);
   139‚Üí					const r = pixel[0];
   140‚Üí					const g = pixel[1];
   141‚Üí					const b = pixel[2];
   142‚Üí
   143‚Üí					// Add color if not already selected (check inside state updater for latest state)
   144‚Üí					const newColor = { r, g, b };
   145‚Üí
   146‚Üí					setOptions((prev) => {
   147‚Üí						// Check if color already exists using latest state
   148‚Üí						const exists = prev.selectedColors?.some(
   149‚Üí							(c) => Math.abs(c.r - r) + Math.abs(c.g - g) + Math.abs(c.b - b) < 15,
   150‚Üí						);
   151‚Üí
   152‚Üí						if (exists) {
   153‚Üí							return prev; // No change
   154‚Üí						}
   155‚Üí
   156‚Üí						return {
   157‚Üí							...prev,
   158‚Üí							selectedColors: [...(prev.selectedColors || []), newColor],
   159‚Üí						};
   160‚Üí					});
   161‚Üí				}
   162‚Üí				src.delete();
   163‚Üí			} catch (err) {
   164‚Üí				console.error('Color picking error:', err);
   165‚Üí			}
   166‚Üí		},
   167‚Üí		[originalImage, cv, loaded],
   168‚Üí	);
   169‚Üí
   170‚Üí	// Remove selected color
   171‚Üí	const handleRemoveColor = useCallback((index: number) => {
   172‚Üí		setOptions((prev) => ({
   173‚Üí			...prev,
   174‚Üí			selectedColors: prev.selectedColors?.filter((_, i) => i !== index) || [],
   175‚Üí		}));
   176‚Üí	}, []);
   177‚Üí
   178‚Üí	// Handle mouse move for magnifier
   179‚Üí	const handleImageMouseMove = useCallback(
   180‚Üí		(event: React.MouseEvent<HTMLImageElement>) => {
   181‚Üí			if (!originalImage) return;
   182‚Üí
   183‚Üí			const img = event.currentTarget;
   184‚Üí			const rect = img.getBoundingClientRect();
   185‚Üí			const x = event.clientX - rect.left;
   186‚Üí			const y = event.clientY - rect.top;
   187‚Üí			const imgX = Math.floor((x / rect.width) * originalImage.naturalWidth);
   188‚Üí			const imgY = Math.floor((y / rect.height) * originalImage.naturalHeight);
   189‚Üí
   190‚Üí			setCursorMagnifier({
   191‚Üí				x: event.clientX,
   192‚Üí				y: event.clientY,
   193‚Üí				imgX,
   194‚Üí				imgY,
   195‚Üí				visible: true,
   196‚Üí			});
   197‚Üí		},
   198‚Üí		[originalImage],
   199‚Üí	);
   200‚Üí
   201‚Üí	const handleImageMouseLeave = useCallback(() => {
   202‚Üí		setCursorMagnifier(null);
   203‚Üí	}, []);
   204‚Üí
   205‚Üí	return (
   206‚Üí		<div className="min-h-screen w-full bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-50 via-indigo-100 to-purple-100 relative overflow-hidden">
   207‚Üí			{/* Animated background elements */}
   208‚Üí			<div className="absolute inset-0 overflow-hidden pointer-events-none">
   209‚Üí				<div className="absolute w-96 h-96 bg-blue-400/20 rounded-full blur-3xl -top-48 -left-48 animate-pulse"></div>
   210‚Üí				<div
   211‚Üí					className="absolute w-96 h-96 bg-purple-400/20 rounded-full blur-3xl -bottom-48 -right-48 animate-pulse"
   212‚Üí					style={{ animationDelay: '1s' }}></div>
   213‚Üí			</div>
   214‚Üí
   215‚Üí			<div className="relative z-10 min-h-screen flex flex-col">
   216‚Üí				{/* Header */}
   217‚Üí				<header className="w-full py-1 px-4 text-center">
   218‚Üí					<h1 className="text-5xl md:text-6xl font-extrabold mb-3 tracking-tight drop-shadow-lg flex flex-row justify-center items-center gap-3">
   219‚Üí						<span className="text-transparent bg-clip-text bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 via-indigo-600 to-purple-600">
   220‚Üí							Remove{' '}
   221‚Üí						</span>
   222‚Üí						<svg
   223‚Üí							className="inline-block align-baseline"
   224‚Üí							width="260"
   225‚Üí							height="70"
   226‚Üí							viewBox="0 0 260 72"
   227‚Üí							xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
   228‚Üí							<defs>
   229‚Üí								<pattern
   230‚Üí									id="headerCheckerPattern"
   231‚Üí									x="0"
   232‚Üí									y="0"
   233‚Üí									width="8"
   234‚Üí									height="8"
   235‚Üí									patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
   236‚Üí									<rect
   237‚Üí										x="0"
   238‚Üí										y="0"
   239‚Üí										width="4"
   240‚Üí										height="4"
   241‚Üí										fill="#D1D5DB"
   242‚Üí									/>
   243‚Üí									<rect
   244‚Üí										x="4"
   245‚Üí										y="0"
   246‚Üí										width="4"
   247‚Üí										height="4"
   248‚Üí										fill="#F3F4F6"
   249‚Üí									/>
   250‚Üí									<rect
   251‚Üí										x="0"
   252‚Üí										y="4"
   253‚Üí										width="4"
   254‚Üí										height="4"
   255‚Üí										fill="#F3F4F6"
   256‚Üí									/>
   257‚Üí									<rect
   258‚Üí										x="4"
   259‚Üí										y="4"
   260‚Üí										width="4"
   261‚Üí										height="4"
   262‚Üí										fill="#D1D5DB"
   263‚Üí									/>
   264‚Üí								</pattern>
   265‚Üí								<linearGradient
   266‚Üí									id="bgGradient"
   267‚Üí									x1="0%"
   268‚Üí									y1="0%"
   269‚Üí									x2="100%"
   270‚Üí									y2="100%">
   271‚Üí									<stop
   272‚Üí										offset="0%"
   273‚Üí										stopColor="#2563EB"
   274‚Üí									/>
   275‚Üí									<stop
   276‚Üí										offset="50%"
   277‚Üí										stopColor="#4F46E5"
   278‚Üí									/>
   279‚Üí									<stop
   280‚Üí										offset="100%"
   281‚Üí										stopColor="#7C3AED"
   282‚Üí									/>
   283‚Üí								</linearGradient>
   284‚Üí							</defs>
   285‚Üí							<text
   286‚Üí								x="0"
   287‚Üí								y="70"
   288‚Üí								font-size="100"
   289‚Üí								font-weight="400"
   290‚Üí								font-family="'Black Ops One', system-ui, -apple-system, sans-serif"
   291‚Üí								fill="url(#headerCheckerPattern)"
   292‚Üí								stroke="url(#bgGradient)"
   293‚Üí								stroke-width="1">
   294‚Üí								BG
   295‚Üí							</text>
   296‚Üí						</svg>
   297‚Üí					</h1>
   298‚Üí					<p className="text-md text-gray-700 max-w-2xl mx-auto font-medium">
   299‚Üí						Remove checkered patterns and backgrounds from your images ‚Äî 100% client-side
   300‚Üí					</p>
   301‚Üí				</header>
   302‚Üí
   303‚Üí				{/* Main Content Area */}
   304‚Üí				<main className="flex-1 flex  justify-center px-4 py-2">
   305‚Üí					{!loaded ? (
   306‚Üí						<div className="text-center">
   307‚Üí							<div className="inline-block animate-spin rounded-full h-16 w-16 border-4 border-blue-600 border-t-transparent mb-6"></div>
   308‚Üí							<p className="text-gray-800 text-xl font-semibold">Loading OpenCV...</p>
   309‚Üí							<p className="text-gray-600 mt-2">This may take a moment on first load</p>
   310‚Üí						</div>
   311‚Üí					) : !originalImage ? (
   312‚Üí						/* Initial Upload State - Centered */
   313‚Üí						<div className="w-full max-w-6xl mx-auto mt-6">
   314‚Üí							<div className="text-center mb-8">
   315‚Üí								<h2 className="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-800 mb-3">Get Started</h2>
   316‚Üí								<p className="text-gray-600 text-lg">Upload an image to remove its background instantly</p>
   317‚Üí							</div>
   318‚Üí							<div className="flex flex-row gap-8">
   319‚Üí								<div className="flex-1">
   320‚Üí									<ImageUploader onImageLoad={handleImageLoad} />
   321‚Üí								</div>
   322‚Üí								<div className="flex-1 mt-4 bg-white/60 backdrop-blur-sm border border-gray-200 rounded-2xl p-6 shadow-lg">
   323‚Üí									<h3 className="text-gray-800 font-semibold text-lg mb-4 flex items-center gap-2">
   324‚Üí										<svg
   325‚Üí											className="w-5 h-5 text-blue-600"
   326‚Üí											fill="currentColor"
   327‚Üí											viewBox="0 0 20 20">
   328‚Üí											<path
   329‚Üí												fillRule="evenodd"
   330‚Üí												d="M18 10a8 8 0 11-16 0 8 8 0 0116 0zm-7-4a1 1 0 11-2 0 1 1 0 012 0zM9 9a1 1 0 000 2v3a1 1 0 001 1h1a1 1 0 100-2v-3a1 1 0 00-1-1H9z"
   331‚Üí												clipRule="evenodd"
   332‚Üí											/>
   333‚Üí										</svg>
   334‚Üí										How it works
   335‚Üí									</h3>
   336‚Üí									<ul className="text-gray-700 space-y-3">
   337‚Üí										<li className="flex items-start gap-3">
   338‚Üí											<span className="text-blue-600 font-bold">1.</span>
   339‚Üí											<span>Upload a PNG or JPG image with a checkered or solid background</span>
   340‚Üí										</li>
   341‚Üí										<li className="flex items-start gap-3">
   342‚Üí											<span className="text-blue-600 font-bold">2.</span>
   343‚Üí											<span>Choose processing options and adjust tolerance</span>
   344‚Üí										</li>
   345‚Üí										<li className="flex items-start gap-3">
   346‚Üí											<span className="text-blue-600 font-bold">3.</span>
   347‚Üí											<span>Preview, crop if needed, and download as transparent PNG</span>
   348‚Üí										</li>
   349‚Üí									</ul>
   350‚Üí								</div>
   351‚Üí							</div>
   352‚Üí						</div>
   353‚Üí					) : (
   354‚Üí						/* Split View - After Upload */
   355‚Üí						<div className="w-full max-w-[1600px] mx-auto px-4">
   356‚Üí							{error && (
   357‚Üí								<div
   358‚Üí									role="alert"
   359‚Üí									className="bg-red-50 backdrop-blur-sm border border-red-300 text-red-800 px-6 py-4 rounded-xl mb-6 shadow-lg">
   360‚Üí									<p className="font-semibold flex items-center gap-2">
   361‚Üí										<span className="inline-block h-3 w-3 rounded-full bg-red-500 animate-pulse"></span>
   362‚Üí										Processing failed
   363‚Üí									</p>
   364‚Üí									<p className="text-sm mt-1 text-red-700">{error}</p>
   365‚Üí								</div>
   366‚Üí							)}
   367‚Üí							<div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-8">
   368‚Üí								{/* Left: Preview */}
   369‚Üí								<div className="flex flex-col gap-4 min-w-0">
   370‚Üí									<div className="bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-sm border border-gray-200 rounded-2xl p-6 shadow-xl">
   371‚Üí										<div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-4 flex-wrap gap-2">
   372‚Üí											<h3 className="text-gray-800 font-semibold text-lg">Original Image</h3>
   373‚Üí											<button
   374‚Üí												onClick={handleReset}
   375‚Üí												className="text-sm text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-700 bg-blue-50 hover:bg-blue-100 px-4 py-2 rounded-lg transition-all duration-200 border border-blue-200 hover:border-blue-300 whitespace-nowrap">
   376‚Üí												Change Image
   377‚Üí											</button>
   378‚Üí										</div>
   379‚Üí										<div className="relative bg-gradient-to-br from-gray-50 to-gray-100 rounded-xl border border-gray-200 overflow-hidden flex items-center justify-center min-h-[300px]">
   380‚Üí											<img
   381‚Üí												src={showPreview && previewMask ? previewMask : originalImage.src}
   382‚Üí												alt="Original"
   383‚Üí												className="max-w-full h-auto max-h-[600px] object-contain cursor-crosshair"
   384‚Üí												onClick={handleImageClick}
   385‚Üí												onMouseMove={handleImageMouseMove}
   386‚Üí												onMouseLeave={handleImageMouseLeave}
   387‚Üí												title="Click to pick a background color to remove"
   388‚Üí											/>
   389‚Üí											{cursorMagnifier && cursorMagnifier.visible && originalImage && cv && (
   390‚Üí												<div
   391‚Üí													className="fixed pointer-events-none z-50"
   392‚Üí													style={{
   393‚Üí														left: cursorMagnifier.x - 100,
   394‚Üí														top: cursorMagnifier.y - 168 - 110,
   395‚Üí													}}>
   396‚Üí													{/* Color info */}
   397‚Üí													<div className="mt-2 bg-blue-600 text-white text-xs px-3 py-1 rounded-lg shadow-lg text-center font-mono">
   398‚Üí														{(() => {
   399‚Üí															try {
   400‚Üí																const src = cv.imread(originalImage);
   401‚Üí																if (
   402‚Üí																	cursorMagnifier.imgX >= 0 &&
   403‚Üí																	cursorMagnifier.imgX < src.cols &&
   404‚Üí																	cursorMagnifier.imgY >= 0 &&
   405‚Üí																	cursorMagnifier.imgY < src.rows
   406‚Üí																) {
   407‚Üí																	const pixel = src.ucharPtr(cursorMagnifier.imgY, cursorMagnifier.imgX);
   408‚Üí																	const color = `RGB(${pixel[0]}, ${pixel[1]}, ${pixel[2]})`;
   409‚Üí																	src.delete();
   410‚Üí																	return color;
   411‚Üí																}
   412‚Üí																src.delete();
   413‚Üí																return 'Out of bounds';
   414‚Üí															} catch {
   415‚Üí																return 'Error';
   416‚Üí															}
   417‚Üí														})()}
   418‚Üí													</div>
   419‚Üí													<div className="relative w-32 h-32 rounded-full border-4 border-blue-500 shadow-2xl overflow-hidden bg-white">
   420‚Üí														<canvas
   421‚Üí															ref={(canvas) => {
   422‚Üí																if (!canvas || !originalImage) return;
   423‚Üí																const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
   424‚Üí																if (!ctx) return;
   425‚Üí
   426‚Üí																const radius = 16;
   427‚Üí																const scale = 4;
   428‚Üí																canvas.width = 128;
   429‚Üí																canvas.height = 128;
   430‚Üí
   431‚Üí																// Draw magnified portion
   432‚Üí																const sx = Math.max(0, cursorMagnifier.imgX - radius);
   433‚Üí																const sy = Math.max(0, cursorMagnifier.imgY - radius);
   434‚Üí																const sw = Math.min(radius * 2, originalImage.naturalWidth - sx);
   435‚Üí																const sh = Math.min(radius * 2, originalImage.naturalHeight - sy);
   436‚Üí
   437‚Üí																ctx.drawImage(originalImage, sx, sy, sw, sh, 0, 0, sw * scale, sh * scale);
   438‚Üí
   439‚Üí																// Draw crosshair
   440‚Üí																ctx.strokeStyle = '#3b82f6';
   441‚Üí																ctx.lineWidth = 2;
   442‚Üí																ctx.beginPath();
   443‚Üí																ctx.moveTo(64, 0);
   444‚Üí																ctx.lineTo(64, 128);
   445‚Üí																ctx.moveTo(0, 64);
   446‚Üí																ctx.lineTo(128, 64);
   447‚Üí																ctx.stroke();
   448‚Üí
   449‚Üí																// Draw center pixel indicator
   450‚Üí																ctx.fillStyle = '#3b82f6';
   451‚Üí																ctx.fillRect(62, 62, 4, 4);
   452‚Üí															}}
   453‚Üí															width={128}
   454‚Üí															height={128}
   455‚Üí															className="w-full h-full"
   456‚Üí														/>
   457‚Üí													</div>
   458‚Üí												</div>
   459‚Üí											)}
   460‚Üí											{showPreview && (
   461‚Üí												<div className="absolute top-2 right-2 bg-red-500 text-white text-xs px-2 py-1 rounded shadow-lg">
   462‚Üí													Preview Mode
   463‚Üí												</div>
   464‚Üí											)}
   465‚Üí										</div>
   466‚Üí										<p className="text-gray-600 text-sm mt-3 truncate text-center">{fileName}</p>
   467‚Üí									</div>
   468‚Üí									{processing && (
   469‚Üí										<div className="bg-blue-50 backdrop-blur-sm border border-blue-200 rounded-xl p-6 text-center">
   470‚Üí											<div className="inline-block animate-spin rounded-full h-12 w-12 border-4 border-blue-600 border-t-transparent mb-3"></div>
   471‚Üí											<p className="text-gray-800 font-semibold">Processing image...</p>
   472‚Üí											<p className="text-gray-600 text-sm mt-1">This may take a few seconds</p>
   473‚Üí										</div>
   474‚Üí									)}
   475‚Üí								</div>
   476‚Üí
   477‚Üí								{/* Right: Controls */}
   478‚Üí								<div className="flex flex-col gap-6 min-w-0">
   479‚Üí									<ProcessingControls
   480‚Üí										options={options}
   481‚Üí										onOptionsChange={setOptions}
   482‚Üí										onProcess={handleProcess}
   483‚Üí										onPreview={handlePreview}
   484‚Üí										disabled={processing}
   485‚Üí										showingPreview={showPreview}
   486‚Üí										onRemoveColor={handleRemoveColor}
   487‚Üí									/>
   488‚Üí									<div className="bg-blue-50 backdrop-blur-sm border border-blue-200 rounded-xl p-5 shadow-md">
   489‚Üí										<h4 className="font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 flex items-center gap-2">
   490‚Üí											<svg
   491‚Üí												className="w-5 h-5 text-blue-600 flex-shrink-0"
   492‚Üí												fill="currentColor"
   493‚Üí												viewBox="0 0 20 20">
   494‚Üí												<path
   495‚Üí													fillRule="evenodd"
   496‚Üí													d="M18 10a8 8 0 11-16 0 8 8 0 0116 0zm-7-4a1 1 0 11-2 0 1 1 0 012 0zM9 9a1 1 0 000 2v3a1 1 0 001 1h1a1 1 0 100-2v-3a1 1 0 00-1-1H9z"
   497‚Üí													clipRule="evenodd"
   498‚Üí												/>
   499‚Üí											</svg>
   500‚Üí											Tips
   501‚Üí										</h4>
   502‚Üí										<ul className="text-sm text-gray-700 space-y-2">
   503‚Üí											<li className="flex items-start gap-2">
   504‚Üí												<span className="text-blue-600 mt-0.5">‚Ä¢</span>
   505‚Üí												<span>Automatically detects and removes checkered patterns from edges</span>
   506‚Üí											</li>
   507‚Üí											<li className="flex items-start gap-2">
   508‚Üí												<span className="text-blue-600 mt-0.5">‚Ä¢</span>
   509‚Üí												<span>Click the image to manually pick additional background colors</span>
   510‚Üí											</li>
   511‚Üí											<li className="flex items-start gap-2">
   512‚Üí												<span className="text-blue-600 mt-0.5">‚Ä¢</span>
   513‚Üí												<span>Use the preview mask to see what will be removed before processing</span>
   514‚Üí											</li>
   515‚Üí											<li className="flex items-start gap-2">
   516‚Üí												<span className="text-blue-600 mt-0.5">‚Ä¢</span>
   517‚Üí												<span>All processing happens locally in your browser ‚Äî no uploads!</span>
   518‚Üí											</li>
   519‚Üí										</ul>
   520‚Üí									</div>
   521‚Üí								</div>
   522‚Üí							</div>
   523‚Üí						</div>
   524‚Üí					)}
   525‚Üí				</main>
   526‚Üí
   527‚Üí				<ResultModal
   528‚Üí					imageSrc={processedImage || ''}
   529‚Üí					open={modalOpen && !!processedImage}
   530‚Üí					onClose={() => setModalOpen(false)}
   531‚Üí					onDownload={handleModalDownload}
   532‚Üí				/>
   533‚Üí
   534‚Üí				{/* Footer */}
   535‚Üí				<footer className="w-full text-center py-6 text-sm text-gray-600 border-t border-gray-200 bg-white/50">
   536‚Üí					<div className="max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 space-y-6">
   537‚Üí						{/* Product Hunt + Buy Me a Coffee Row */}
   538‚Üí						<div className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6 md:max-w-3xl mx-auto items-stretch">
   539‚Üí							{/* Product Hunt badge (left) */}

   642‚Üí
   643‚Üífunction App() {
   644‚Üí	return (
   645‚Üí		<OpenCvProvider>
   646‚Üí			<AppContent />
   647‚Üí		</OpenCvProvider>
   648‚Üí	);
   649‚Üí}

            üß∞ Tool Result: Toolu_01Gfnl1Awugwjfdoc1Z8Azcq
            

                2025-10-08 05:59:27
                
            

        

        

    

        
            
     1‚Üíexport interface ProcessingOptions {
     2‚Üí	removeCheckered: boolean;
     3‚Üí	tolerance: number;
     4‚Üí	selectedColors?: Array<{ r: number; g: number; b: number }>;
     5‚Üí}
     6‚Üí
   ...

        
        

            
     1‚Üíexport interface ProcessingOptions {
     2‚Üí	removeCheckered: boolean;
     3‚Üí	tolerance: number;
     4‚Üí	selectedColors?: Array<{ r: number; g: number; b: number }>;
     5‚Üí}
     6‚Üí
     7‚Üíexport const generatePreviewMask = (cv: any, imageElement: HTMLImageElement, options: ProcessingOptions): string => {
     8‚Üí	if (!cv) {
     9‚Üí		throw new Error('OpenCV is not loaded yet. Please wait a moment and try again.');
    10‚Üí	}
    11‚Üí
    12‚Üí	const src = cv.imread(imageElement);
    13‚Üí	try {
    14‚Üí		// Convert to RGBA if not already
    15‚Üí		if (src.channels() === 3) {
    16‚Üí			cv.cvtColor(src, src, cv.COLOR_RGB2RGBA);
    17‚Üí		}
    18‚Üí
    19‚Üí		// Create mask to track what will be removed
    20‚Üí		const mask = new cv.Mat(src.rows, src.cols, cv.CV_8UC1, new cv.Scalar(0));
    21‚Üí
    22‚Üí		// Process checkered patterns (automatic detection only)
    23‚Üí		if (options.removeCheckered) {
    24‚Üí			const colors = sampleCheckerColors(src);
    25‚Üí			if (colors.length > 0) {
    26‚Üí				const visited = new Array(src.rows).fill(0).map(() => new Array(src.cols).fill(false));
    27‚Üí				const seedPoints = [
    28‚Üí					{ x: 0, y: 0 },
    29‚Üí					{ x: src.cols - 1, y: 0 },
    30‚Üí					{ x: 0, y: src.rows - 1 },
    31‚Üí					{ x: src.cols - 1, y: src.rows - 1 },
    32‚Üí					{ x: Math.floor(src.cols / 2), y: 0 },
    33‚Üí					{ x: Math.floor(src.cols / 2), y: src.rows - 1 },
    34‚Üí					{ x: 0, y: Math.floor(src.rows / 2) },
    35‚Üí					{ x: src.cols - 1, y: Math.floor(src.rows / 2) },
    36‚Üí				];
    37‚Üí
    38‚Üí				for (const seedPoint of seedPoints) {
    39‚Üí					if (seedPoint.x < 0 || seedPoint.x >= src.cols || seedPoint.y < 0 || seedPoint.y >= src.rows) continue;
    40‚Üí					if (visited[seedPoint.y][seedPoint.x]) continue;
    41‚Üí
    42‚Üí					const pixel = src.ucharPtr(seedPoint.y, seedPoint.x);
    43‚Üí					const seedR = pixel[0];
    44‚Üí					const seedG = pixel[1];
    45‚Üí					const seedB = pixel[2];
    46‚Üí
    47‚Üí					// Check if seed matches any checkered color
    48‚Üí					let matchesColor = false;
    49‚Üí					for (const color of colors) {
    50‚Üí						const diff = Math.abs(seedR - color.r) + Math.abs(seedG - color.g) + Math.abs(seedB - color.b);
    51‚Üí						if (diff < options.tolerance * 3) {
    52‚Üí							matchesColor = true;
    53‚Üí							break;
    54‚Üí						}
    55‚Üí					}
    56‚Üí
    57‚Üí					if (matchesColor) {
    58‚Üí						magicWandFillMask(src, mask, visited, seedPoint.x, seedPoint.y, seedR, seedG, seedB, options.tolerance);
    59‚Üí					}
    60‚Üí				}
    61‚Üí			}
    62‚Üí		}
    63‚Üí
    64‚Üí		// Process user-selected colors separately (with higher tolerance for blur/anti-aliasing)
    65‚Üí		if (options.selectedColors && options.selectedColors.length > 0) {
    66‚Üí			const visited = new Array(src.rows).fill(0).map(() => new Array(src.cols).fill(false));
    67‚Üí			const seedPoints = [
    68‚Üí				{ x: 0, y: 0 },
    69‚Üí				{ x: src.cols - 1, y: 0 },
    70‚Üí				{ x: 0, y: src.rows - 1 },
    71‚Üí				{ x: src.cols - 1, y: src.rows - 1 },
    72‚Üí				{ x: Math.floor(src.cols / 2), y: 0 },
    73‚Üí				{ x: Math.floor(src.cols / 2), y: src.rows - 1 },
    74‚Üí				{ x: 0, y: Math.floor(src.rows / 2) },
    75‚Üí				{ x: src.cols - 1, y: Math.floor(src.rows / 2) },
    76‚Üí			];
    77‚Üí
    78‚Üí			for (const seedPoint of seedPoints) {
    79‚Üí				if (seedPoint.x < 0 || seedPoint.x >= src.cols || seedPoint.y < 0 || seedPoint.y >= src.rows) continue;
    80‚Üí				if (visited[seedPoint.y][seedPoint.x]) continue;
    81‚Üí
    82‚Üí				const pixel = src.ucharPtr(seedPoint.y, seedPoint.x);
    83‚Üí				const seedR = pixel[0];
    84‚Üí				const seedG = pixel[1];
    85‚Üí				const seedB = pixel[2];
    86‚Üí
    87‚Üí				// Check if seed matches any user-selected color (with higher tolerance)
    88‚Üí				let matchesColor = false;
    89‚Üí				for (const color of options.selectedColors) {
    90‚Üí					const diff = Math.abs(seedR - color.r) + Math.abs(seedG - color.g) + Math.abs(seedB - color.b);
    91‚Üí					if (diff < options.tolerance * 5) {
    92‚Üí						matchesColor = true;
    93‚Üí						break;
    94‚Üí					}
    95‚Üí				}
    96‚Üí
    97‚Üí				if (matchesColor) {
    98‚Üí					// Use higher tolerance for flood fill to catch blur/anti-aliasing
    99‚Üí					magicWandFillMask(src, mask, visited, seedPoint.x, seedPoint.y, seedR, seedG, seedB, options.tolerance * 1.5);
   100‚Üí				}
   101‚Üí			}
   102‚Üí		}
   103‚Üí
   104‚Üí		// Create red overlay for masked areas
   105‚Üí		const overlay = new cv.Mat(src.rows, src.cols, cv.CV_8UC4);
   106‚Üí		for (let y = 0; y < src.rows; y++) {
   107‚Üí			for (let x = 0; x < src.cols; x++) {
   108‚Üí				const srcPixel = src.ucharPtr(y, x);
   109‚Üí				const overlayPixel = overlay.ucharPtr(y, x);
   110‚Üí				const maskValue = mask.ucharPtr(y, x)[0];
   111‚Üí
   112‚Üí				if (maskValue === 255) {
   113‚Üí					// Red overlay with 50% opacity
   114‚Üí					overlayPixel[0] = Math.floor(srcPixel[0] * 0.5 + 255 * 0.5);
   115‚Üí					overlayPixel[1] = Math.floor(srcPixel[1] * 0.5);
   116‚Üí					overlayPixel[2] = Math.floor(srcPixel[2] * 0.5);
   117‚Üí					overlayPixel[3] = 255;
   118‚Üí				} else {
   119‚Üí					overlayPixel[0] = srcPixel[0];
   120‚Üí					overlayPixel[1] = srcPixel[1];
   121‚Üí					overlayPixel[2] = srcPixel[2];
   122‚Üí					overlayPixel[3] = srcPixel[3] || 255;
   123‚Üí				}
   124‚Üí			}
   125‚Üí		}
   126‚Üí
   127‚Üí		const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
   128‚Üí		canvas.width = imageElement.naturalWidth || src.cols;
   129‚Üí		canvas.height = imageElement.naturalHeight || src.rows;
   130‚Üí		cv.imshow(canvas, overlay);
   131‚Üí		const dataUrl = canvas.toDataURL('image/png');
   132‚Üí
   133‚Üí		mask.delete();
   134‚Üí		overlay.delete();
   135‚Üí		return dataUrl;
   136‚Üí	} finally {
   137‚Üí		src.delete();
   138‚Üí	}
   139‚Üí};
   140‚Üí
   141‚Üífunction magicWandFillMask(
   142‚Üí	src: any,
   143‚Üí	mask: any,
   144‚Üí	visited: boolean[][],
   145‚Üí	startX: number,
   146‚Üí	startY: number,
   147‚Üí	targetR: number,
   148‚Üí	targetG: number,
   149‚Üí	targetB: number,
   150‚Üí	tolerance: number,
   151‚Üí): void {
   152‚Üí	const stack = [{ x: startX, y: startY }];
   153‚Üí	const rows = src.rows;
   154‚Üí	const cols = src.cols;
   155‚Üí
   156‚Üí	while (stack.length > 0) {
   157‚Üí		const { x, y } = stack.pop()!;
   158‚Üí
   159‚Üí		if (x < 0 || x >= cols || y < 0 || y >= rows) continue;
   160‚Üí		if (visited[y][x]) continue;
   161‚Üí
   162‚Üí		const pixel = src.ucharPtr(y, x);
   163‚Üí		const r = pixel[0];
   164‚Üí		const g = pixel[1];
   165‚Üí		const b = pixel[2];
   166‚Üí
   167‚Üí		const diff = Math.abs(r - targetR) + Math.abs(g - targetG) + Math.abs(b - targetB);
   168‚Üí		if (diff > tolerance * 3) continue;
   169‚Üí
   170‚Üí		visited[y][x] = true;
   171‚Üí		mask.ucharPtr(y, x)[0] = 255;
   172‚Üí
   173‚Üí		stack.push({ x: x + 1, y });
   174‚Üí		stack.push({ x: x - 1, y });
   175‚Üí		stack.push({ x, y: y + 1 });
   176‚Üí		stack.push({ x, y: y - 1 });
   177‚Üí	}
   178‚Üí}
   179‚Üí
   180‚Üíexport const processImage = (cv: any, imageElement: HTMLImageElement, options: ProcessingOptions): string => {
   181‚Üí	if (!cv) {
   182‚Üí		throw new Error('OpenCV is not loaded yet. Please wait a moment and try again.');
   183‚Üí	}
   184‚Üí	// Read image
   185‚Üí	const src = cv.imread(imageElement);
   186‚Üí	const dst = new cv.Mat();
   187‚Üí
   188‚Üí	try {
   189‚Üí		// Convert to RGBA if not already
   190‚Üí		if (src.channels() === 3) {
   191‚Üí			cv.cvtColor(src, src, cv.COLOR_RGB2RGBA);
   192‚Üí		}
   193‚Üí
   194‚Üí		// Create alpha channel
   195‚Üí		const alpha = new cv.Mat(src.rows, src.cols, cv.CV_8UC1, new cv.Scalar(255));
   196‚Üí
   197‚Üí		// Detect and remove checkered pattern
   198‚Üí		if (options.removeCheckered) {
   199‚Üí			removeCheckeredPattern(cv, src, alpha, options.tolerance, options.selectedColors);
   200‚Üí		}
   201‚Üí
   202‚Üí		// Apply alpha channel
   203‚Üí		const channels = new cv.MatVector();
   204‚Üí		cv.split(src, channels);
   205‚Üí		channels.set(3, alpha);
   206‚Üí		cv.merge(channels, dst);
   207‚Üí
   208‚Üí		// Create canvas and export at native resolution
   209‚Üí		const canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
   210‚Üí		canvas.width = imageElement.naturalWidth || src.cols;
   211‚Üí		canvas.height = imageElement.naturalHeight || src.rows;
   212‚Üí		cv.imshow(canvas, dst);
   213‚Üí		const dataUrl = canvas.toDataURL('image/png');
   214‚Üí
   215‚Üí		// Cleanup
   216‚Üí		channels.delete();
   217‚Üí		alpha.delete();
   218‚Üí
   219‚Üí		return dataUrl;
   220‚Üí	} finally {
   221‚Üí		src.delete();
   222‚Üí		dst.delete();
   223‚Üí	}
   224‚Üí};
   225‚Üí
   226‚Üífunction removeCheckeredPattern(
   227‚Üí	_cv: any,
   228‚Üí	src: any,
   229‚Üí	alpha: any,
   230‚Üí	tolerance: number,
   231‚Üí	selectedColors?: Array<{ r: number; g: number; b: number }>,
   232‚Üí): void {
   233‚Üí	// Sample corner pixels to detect checkered pattern colors (automatic detection only)
   234‚Üí	const colors = sampleCheckerColors(src);
   235‚Üí	if (colors.length === 0) return;
   236‚Üí
   237‚Üí	// Create a visited mask to track which pixels we've already processed
   238‚Üí	const visited = new Array(src.rows).fill(0).map(() => new Array(src.cols).fill(false));
   239‚Üí
   240‚Üí	// Seed points to start flood fill from (edges)
   241‚Üí	const seedPoints = [
   242‚Üí		{ x: 0, y: 0 },
   243‚Üí		{ x: src.cols - 1, y: 0 },
   244‚Üí		{ x: 0, y: src.rows - 1 },
   245‚Üí		{ x: src.cols - 1, y: src.rows - 1 },
   246‚Üí		{ x: Math.floor(src.cols / 2), y: 0 },
   247‚Üí		{ x: Math.floor(src.cols / 2), y: src.rows - 1 },
   248‚Üí		{ x: 0, y: Math.floor(src.rows / 2) },
   249‚Üí		{ x: src.cols - 1, y: Math.floor(src.rows / 2) },
   250‚Üí	];
   251‚Üí
   252‚Üí	// Flood fill from each seed point
   253‚Üí	for (const seedPoint of seedPoints) {
   254‚Üí		if (seedPoint.x < 0 || seedPoint.x >= src.cols || seedPoint.y < 0 || seedPoint.y >= src.rows) continue;
   255‚Üí		if (visited[seedPoint.y][seedPoint.x]) continue;
   256‚Üí
   257‚Üí		const pixel = src.ucharPtr(seedPoint.y, seedPoint.x);
   258‚Üí		const seedR = pixel[0];
   259‚Üí		const seedG = pixel[1];
   260‚Üí		const seedB = pixel[2];
   261‚Üí
   262‚Üí		// Check if seed matches any checkered color
   263‚Üí		let matchesChecker = false;
   264‚Üí		for (const color of colors) {
   265‚Üí			const diff = Math.abs(seedR - color.r) + Math.abs(seedG - color.g) + Math.abs(seedB - color.b);
   266‚Üí			if (diff < tolerance * 3) {
   267‚Üí				matchesChecker = true;
   268‚Üí				break;
   269‚Üí			}
   270‚Üí		}
   271‚Üí
   272‚Üí		if (matchesChecker) {
   273‚Üí			// Magic wand style flood fill
   274‚Üí			magicWandFill(src, alpha, visited, seedPoint.x, seedPoint.y, seedR, seedG, seedB, tolerance);
   275‚Üí		}
   276‚Üí	}
   277‚Üí
   278‚Üí	// Process user-selected colors separately with higher tolerance
   279‚Üí	if (selectedColors && selectedColors.length > 0) {
   280‚Üí		const userVisited = new Array(src.rows).fill(0).map(() => new Array(src.cols).fill(false));
   281‚Üí		for (const seedPoint of seedPoints) {
   282‚Üí			if (seedPoint.x < 0 || seedPoint.x >= src.cols || seedPoint.y < 0 || seedPoint.y >= src.rows) continue;
   283‚Üí			if (userVisited[seedPoint.y][seedPoint.x]) continue;
   284‚Üí
   285‚Üí			const pixel = src.ucharPtr(seedPoint.y, seedPoint.x);
   286‚Üí			const seedR = pixel[0];
   287‚Üí			const seedG = pixel[1];
   288‚Üí			const seedB = pixel[2];
   289‚Üí
   290‚Üí			// Check if seed matches any user-selected color
   291‚Üí			let matchesUserColor = false;
   292‚Üí			for (const color of selectedColors) {
   293‚Üí				const diff = Math.abs(seedR - color.r) + Math.abs(seedG - color.g) + Math.abs(seedB - color.b);
   294‚Üí				if (diff < tolerance * 5) {
   295‚Üí					matchesUserColor = true;
   296‚Üí					break;
   297‚Üí				}
   298‚Üí			}
   299‚Üí
   300‚Üí			if (matchesUserColor) {
   301‚Üí				// Use higher tolerance for user colors to catch blur/anti-aliasing
   302‚Üí				magicWandFill(src, alpha, userVisited, seedPoint.x, seedPoint.y, seedR, seedG, seedB, tolerance * 1.5);
   303‚Üí			}
   304‚Üí		}
   305‚Üí	}
   306‚Üí}
   307‚Üí
   308‚Üífunction magicWandFill(
   309‚Üí	src: any,
   310‚Üí	alpha: any,
   311‚Üí	visited: boolean[][],
   312‚Üí	startX: number,
   313‚Üí	startY: number,
   314‚Üí	targetR: number,
   315‚Üí	targetG: number,
   316‚Üí	targetB: number,
   317‚Üí	tolerance: number,
   318‚Üí): void {
   319‚Üí	const stack = [{ x: startX, y: startY }];
   320‚Üí	const rows = src.rows;
   321‚Üí	const cols = src.cols;
   322‚Üí
   323‚Üí	while (stack.length > 0) {
   324‚Üí		const { x, y } = stack.pop()!;
   325‚Üí
   326‚Üí		// Bounds check
   327‚Üí		if (x < 0 || x >= cols || y < 0 || y >= rows) continue;
   328‚Üí		if (visited[y][x]) continue;
   329‚Üí
   330‚Üí		const pixel = src.ucharPtr(y, x);
   331‚Üí		const r = pixel[0];
   332‚Üí		const g = pixel[1];
   333‚Üí		const b = pixel[2];
   334‚Üí
   335‚Üí		// Color similarity check
   336‚Üí		const diff = Math.abs(r - targetR) + Math.abs(g - targetG) + Math.abs(b - targetB);
   337‚Üí		if (diff > tolerance * 3) continue;
   338‚Üí
   339‚Üí		// Mark as visited and transparent
   340‚Üí		visited[y][x] = true;
   341‚Üí		alpha.ucharPtr(y, x)[0] = 0;
   342‚Üí
   343‚Üí		// Add neighbors to stack (4-connectivity)
   344‚Üí		stack.push({ x: x + 1, y });
   345‚Üí		stack.push({ x: x - 1, y });
   346‚Üí		stack.push({ x, y: y + 1 });
   347‚Üí		stack.push({ x, y: y - 1 });
   348‚Üí	}
   349‚Üí}
   350‚Üí
   351‚Üífunction sampleCheckerColors(src: any): Array<{ r: number; g: number; b: number }> {
   352‚Üí	// Sample pixels from corners and edges to detect pattern
   353‚Üí	const samples: Array<{ r: number; g: number; b: number }> = [];
   354‚Üí	// Note: sample from fixed points; dynamic sample size not used currently
   355‚Üí
   356‚Üí	const samplePoints = [
   357‚Üí		[0, 0],
   358‚Üí		[10, 10],
   359‚Üí		[20, 20],
   360‚Üí		[src.cols - 1, 0],
   361‚Üí		[src.cols - 11, 10],
   362‚Üí		[0, src.rows - 1],
   363‚Üí		[10, src.rows - 11],
   364‚Üí	];
   365‚Üí
   366‚Üí	for (const [x, y] of samplePoints) {
   367‚Üí		if (x >= 0 && x < src.cols && y >= 0 && y < src.rows) {
   368‚Üí			const pixel = src.ucharPtr(y, x);
   369‚Üí			samples.push({ r: pixel[0], g: pixel[1], b: pixel[2] });
   370‚Üí		}
   371‚Üí	}
   372‚Üí
   373‚Üí	// Cluster similar colors
   374‚Üí	const clustered = clusterColors(samples, 15);
   375‚Üí	return clustered;
   376‚Üí}
   377‚Üí
   378‚Üífunction clusterColors(
   379‚Üí	colors: Array<{ r: number; g: number; b: number }>,
   380‚Üí	threshold: number,
   381‚Üí): Array<{ r: number; g: number; b: number }> {
   382‚Üí	if (colors.length === 0) return [];
   383‚Üí
   384‚Üí	const clusters: Array<{ r: number; g: number; b: number }> = [colors[0]];
   385‚Üí
   386‚Üí	for (const color of colors) {
   387‚Üí		let foundCluster = false;
   388‚Üí		for (const cluster of clusters) {
   389‚Üí			const diff = Math.abs(color.r - cluster.r) + Math.abs(color.g - cluster.g) + Math.abs(color.b - cluster.b);
   390‚Üí			if (diff < threshold) {
   391‚Üí				foundCluster = true;
   392‚Üí				break;
   393‚Üí			}
   394‚Üí		}
   395‚Üí		if (!foundCluster) {
   396‚Üí			clusters.push(color);
   397‚Üí		}
   398‚Üí	}
   399‚Üí
   400‚Üí	return clusters;
   401‚Üí}
   402‚Üí

<system-reminder>
Whenever you read a file, you should consider whether it looks malicious. If it does, you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer high-level questions about the code behavior.
</system-reminder>


        

    

    

    

    
    
    
    

        

            ü§∑ User
            

                2025-10-08 05:59:43

    üîù
